issue.title: Accessibility issue: Elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds on /

findings.html: Um sistema pensado para emergências infantis — rápido, simples e seguro.
findings.problemShort: elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds
findings.solutionShort: ensure the contrast between foreground and background colors meets wcag 2 aa minimum contrast ratio thresholds
findings.solutionLong:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has insufficient color contrast of 4.44 (foreground color: #6c757d, background color: #f8f9fa, font size: 15.0pt (20px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

issue.title: Accessibility issue: <html> element must have a lang attribute on /

findings.problemShort: <html> element must have a lang attribute
findings.solutionShort: ensure every html document has a lang attribute
findings.solutionLong:
Fix any of the following:
  The <html> element does not have a lang attribute

findings.problemShort: elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds
findings.solutionShort: ensure the contrast between foreground and background colors meets wcag 2 aa minimum contrast ratio thresholds
findings.solutionLong:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has insufficient color contrast of 4.16 (foreground color: #ffffff, background color: #e63946, font size: 15.0pt (20px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

findings.problemShort: page should contain a level-one heading
findings.solutionShort: ensure that the page, or at least one of its frames contains a level-one heading
findings.solutionLong:
Fix all of the following:
  Page must have a level-one heading
